title: (Weds Full) Bobby Chokes Down a Slice of Humble Pie in NYC + 2 Truths and A Lie + How Much Did We Win in the Lottery?
itunes:title: (Weds Full) Bobby Chokes Down a Slice of Humble Pie in NYC + 2 Truths and A Lie + How Much Did We Win in the Lottery?
description:
Bobby shares a humbling story that happened to him while he was doing press in New York City for his new show “Snake in the Grass”. We play a round of 2 Truths and a Lie with Listener Katy. Can you spot what member of the morning show is lying? No one won the big jackpot…but did we win any money in our lottery pool? Lunchbox gives us the update.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
